name: ABC
text: RT @ABCWorldNews: ONE HEARTBEAT: Two families have been brought together after a Virginia teen died in a car accident and his heart was donated, with the recipient alive today because of that gift traveling to say thank you in person. @TomLlamasABC reports. #AmericaStrong https://t.co/pkOle3oiCO https://t.co/9YneJIR79u

name: ABC
text:
Vast crowds of protesters flooded Belarus' capital of Minsk in the largest political demonstration in the country's history, demanding that its authoritarian leader step down.

Demonstrators in the capital were estimated to number well over 100,000. https://t.co/O5lHyDV1SU https://t.co/QYinLDhQVd

name: ABC
text: The Democratic Party is tapping a diverse group of faith leaders to speak at its presidential nominating convention this coming week. https://t.co/AXLZ7BDCuV

name: ABC
text: Jason Miller, a senior adviser to President Donald Trump's campaign, accused Democrats of trying "change the rules" on mail-in voting weeks before November's presidential election. https://t.co/f4YcJDW5ie

name: ABC
text: Mark Rapley says he and his wife Chantelle Doyle were spending the day at Shelly Beach in Australia when a great white shark attacked Doyle and threw her off her surfboard. Rapley grabbed on to his wife's board and began punching the shark until it let go. https://t.co/F0SSGEu57y https://t.co/33lGpn4wkr
